reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits nicely and flatters many body types, with one mentioning it accentuates their curves perfectly. The material receives positive feedback for its amazing quality, stretchiness, and comfort, with one customer noting it's comfortable even in 90-degree heat. They appreciate its appearance, saying it looks expensive, and consider it good value for the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Loved this dress. Ended up wearing it to a wedding. Very comfortable and flattering. The material is like a typical dress; a bit scratchy but still comfortable to wear. The material isn't too thick and the weight isn't too heavy. It's good for a night out and also for something more formal like a wedding. The quality is also amazing for the price. I would say it fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Kendyll

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for a formal Event
items.body: Very good quality and great material. Perfect thickness. Very comfortable and looks even better in person. Fit as described. Read more
items.author: Shana Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Stunning Dress!
items.body: I couldnâ€™t be happier with this dress! The fabric feels amazing against the skin and super comfortable. The fit is incredibly flattering in all the right places, giving a confident, elegant silhouette without feeling restrictive. I wore it to an evening wedding and got so many compliments throughout the night. Itâ€™s sophisticated, stylish, and perfect for any special occasion. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Claudette Surrento

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress
items.body: Very nice fit. This dress hugs in all the right places. Seems to be of good quality but I havenâ€™t worn it to my event yet. Read more
items.author: Tiffany Rothermel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress for any occassion
items.body: I wish I would have written a review sooner. I wore this dress for my sons wedding and was extremely happy with the color, the fit and ALL of the compliments I received. The cut is perfect, size ran accordingly and the comfort? I was able to walk down the aisle with my son, feel amazing and danced all night! Read more
items.author: Blondie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks expensive!!
items.body: I love the this dress, got a lot off compliments! Got the burgundy color. It was very flattering. The fabric was nice bought a large and fitting was perfect . The zipper closure on the back has good quality. Wore to a friends wedding in Dallas in December . Read more
items.author: Maria BetÃ¢nia Damota

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too small and short
items.body: Not long enough for a tall person and runs very small Iâ€™m 5â€™11. 235# 40D Cup. 34â€ inseam I always wear size 16 or xl in womenâ€™s This dress is 4+ inches too short and 1 1/2 size too small. If they had xxl or xxxl, Iâ€™d buy it again because the dark green color is gorgeous and this style can be very flattering Read more
items.author: Pamela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So budget friendly but looking so much more expensive!!!
items.body: Gonna cut to the chase here: If you want an expensive looking boutique dress, at a price far less than boutique pricingâ€”this is THE dress for you! I was very impressed and beyond pleased with how this dress fit and looked, for a wedding we just attended. Though I obviously donâ€™t have the figure of the young model, as seen in the listing, I really liked how this dress fit me and gained many compliments from others. For the figure I have (Iâ€™m almost 61 now) I truly believe the listing photos represent honestly and ethically what you will receive. The fabric is stretchy, so the dress conforms to the way you are shaped. And even better, for a body con gown, I feel it does a great job hiding the little bloopers we all get with age andâ€¦.well, age lol. The most surprising part for me was how the long ruffle is very much like the listing photoâ€”so long as you do one dreaded or dirty deed: Iron it on a polyester medium setting. This took a bit to do, as the dress arrives quite wrinkled. I ironed it on the â€œwrongâ€ side so the iron didnâ€™t leave marks on the good side of the dress. It also required some steam and need to repeat some parts with the iron after passing over sections once. If this is a drawback for you, perhaps consider getting the dress professionally steamed. I mean, heck, for the price of this dress, itâ€™s still a reasonable expense if you get this professionally pressed instead of doing it yourself. When I confessed to a few wedding guests what this cost, they were absolutely shocked. Most of them replied that this looks like a $200-300 designer gown. With the fabric being so substantial, I can definitely agree. Even better, itâ€™s not super heavy (so it doesnâ€™t feel too hot when dancing etc) and the overall comfort was excellent. Almost like wearing a jersey material, TBH. The zipper btw is of great quality. Didnâ€™t stick once during my trial fittings or day of wearing to event. There is also a small button in back at top of neck, to keep the halter panel more secure. â¬‡ï¸â¬‡ï¸ TL;DR â¬‡ï¸â¬‡ï¸ If you want to get a $200-300 dress, go aheadâ€¦but why, when you can get this? Great comfort, fit, stretch, fabric, exudes classic elegance, and built for just about any figure. (Details to help others w attached photo: I am 5.6 1/2â€ wearing 3â€ heels. Weight 148. Wearing unpadded strapless bra and no shaper underneath. Though the slit can be a tad high while sitting, I think I could have worn a shaper after all. But too late now lol) ETA: wore this to yet another wedding and still got a ton of compliments. And washed it in gentle cold in my washing machine. Tumbled on hot steam setting for about 5 minutes and barely have any ironing to do, for my next wear. THIS DRESS IS THE BOMB ðŸ’–â˜ºï¸ðŸ’– Read more
items.author: Dr. Jay

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Evening Split Bodycon Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Evening Split Bodycon Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Burgundy#2, Burgundy, Magenta, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
